item.title: Generating Synthetic Comments to Balance Data for Text Classification
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Data Exploration Data Pre-Processing Text Generation(1): Language Model - GloVe Further Text Preparation Modeling Generation Text Generation(2): Language Model - GPT-2 Why GPT-2? What makes GPT-2 so powerful? The Problem of Long-Term Dependencies GPT-2 Architecture How does GPT-2 create text? Input Encoding 1. Token Embeddings (wte) 2. Positional Encoding (wpe) GPT-2 - Token Processing Overview Self-Attention Process 1. Query, Key and Value vector 2.
